topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53ffd00863687217e50e0000#post_53ffd00863687217e50e0000

New writers and new staff entirely. Stephen Hillenburg left. It uses alot of jokes and scenarios more aimed toward young children now. Basically it became the standard kids show you see today.

Also alot of the characters were flanderized (highly exaggerated) to the moon and back.
topics.author: 500757fd7f123b75a90003b1
